EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-06-06-5.9 Release Channel.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: New Turbonomic 5.9 Accelerates the Journey to Hybrid Cloud!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://login-greencircle.vmturbo.com/?referer=%2Fvideos%2F1438]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Today, Turbonomic announced <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/turbonomic-announces-5-9/]]> major advancements to our hybrid cloud management platform with Turbonomic 5.9, enabling customers to confidently accelerate their journey to hybrid cloud. Turbonomic 5.9 extends the platform’s on-premises capabilities with new support for Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Microsoft Azure public cloud environments, delivering:
- Visibility of all workloads, whether on-premises or in AWS and Azure environments - Acceleration of public cloud migration - Lowering of public cloud bills by 30% on average - Control of workloads to assure performance and deliver service levels - Enforcement of compliance policies across a hybrid cloud
For more information on these new capabilities, we encourage you to visit the Turbonomic Partner Portal <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/partner-portal]]> and watch a pre-recorded webinar <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/videos/1438]]> that outlines the benefit to your customers, the opportunities for you – our valued partners – and detailed information about the platform’s new capabilities. [NOTE: Turbonomic 5.9 is generally available today. Request an update to Turbonomic 5.9 here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1292-how-to-perform-an-operations-manager-offline-update-latest-links-included]]> on the Green Circle.] Thank you for your continued partnership. Thank you, - Your Turbonomic Partner Team
